brianStory.title: Brian's Quantum Linguistic Shift
brianStory.original: "I love you, BUT I need space."
brianStory.transformed: "I love you, AND I need space."
brianStory.lesson: The word 'but' acts as a quantum eraser. The word 'and' creates quantum entanglement.

stressQuantum.title: Stress: The Collapse of Infinite Possibility
stressQuantum.explanation: Stress kills without touching you. It is the collapse of infinite possibility into a single, contracted reality.
stressQuantum.observerEffect: Your thoughts are the observer. Your words record the measurement.
